message_1: A bank uses one-time pad encryption to protect its customers' financial information. If the bank wants to send a message containing 1500 characters, how long should the one-time pad key be in order to ensure absolute security?
message_2: To ensure absolute security with a one-time pad encryption, the key must be the same length as the message. Therefore, for a message containing 1500 characters, the one-time pad key should also be 1500 characters long.
